at_least_two_players_required: At least 2 players are required to start the game.
delete_data_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete all data and logout?
error_creating_room: An error occurred while creating the room: {error}
exit_confirmation: Are you sure you want to exit?
failed_to_create_room: Failed to create room. Please try again.
finger_description:
LIFT your finger if it flies (bird, plane, butterfly)
KEEP it DOWN if it can't (car, table, rock)
friends_family_online_description: Play with friends and family online! Create a room, share the room code, and invite others to join. Real-time multiplayer experience with live score tracking.
friends_onboarding_desc1: Create a room and invite your friends to join the fun!
friends_onboarding_desc2:
Tap 'Friends' to create a room
Choose how many players (2-4)
Share the room code with friends
friends_onboarding_desc3:
Enter the room code shared by your friend
Wait for the host to start the game
friends_onboarding_desc4:
As the host, you control the game
Tap the circle to start
All players must have fingers down
friends_onboarding_desc5:
Same rules as solo mode
LIFT finger if it flies, KEEP DOWN if it can't
Compete with friends for the highest score!
game_description: Chidiya udd, a game that we all have played in our childhood is mind and hand coordination game. Physical version of the game was played by a group of people where one would speak out the objects and other player would have to react with their finger up or down depending upon if the object can fly in a timely manner.
game_levels_description: The game has three levels - Easy, Medium & Hard. The levels differ in the time in which one has to respond, complexity of words, number of words per game round.
game_modes_description:
Choose between Easy, Medium, and Hard modes
Easy: 10 objects, Medium: 20 objects, Hard: 30 objects
game_modes_list:
‚Ä¢ Solo Mode (vs AI)
‚Ä¢ Multiplayer Offline
‚Ä¢ Friends & Family Online
‚Ä¢ Global Leaderboard
global_scoreboard_description: Compete with players worldwide! Your scores are automatically saved to the global leaderboard. Check your ranking and compete for the top spot.
information_collection_placeholder: Your information collection and use section goes here.
latest_features_list:
‚Ä¢ Online Multiplayer
‚Ä¢ Global Scoreboard
‚Ä¢ Deep Link Sharing
‚Ä¢ In-App Reviews
‚Ä¢ Auto Updates
‚Ä¢ Sound & Speech Controls
listen_description:
An object name will be announced.
Decide quickly: Can it fly?
logout_confirmation: Are you sure you want to logout?
multiplayer_offline_description: The game currently supports up to 4 players. If you are sitting in a group, you can start playing by entering the names and then holding on your positions on the game board. If you're falling short of players then our Computer player will challenge you.
please_enter_room_code: Please enter a room code to join.
please_sign_in_again: Please sign in again to delete your account.
quick_match_description: Play with fellow online players that are looking for a quick match! Just enter your name and start playing. The game will automatically match you with another player.
review_prompt: Enjoying the game? Please rate us!
room_deleted_message: The room you joined has been deleted by the host.
room_not_found_or_full: Room not found or room is full.
score_description:
Correct reactions = Points!
Be the fastest and smartest to win!
scoring_system_description: It's simple! If an object can fly and you have lifted your finger then you would be awarded with a point. Conversely, if you did not lift your finger then you do not get a point. The wrong finger reaction is highlighted by the red color of the box. The player with the highest score at the end of the game wins.
solo_mode_description: Don't worry if you are sitting alone or missing your buddies. Our computer players (Alpha, Beta, Gamma) will give you a tough fight and challenge you in the gameplay.
sound_speech_description: Enjoy immersive gameplay with background music and speech narration. Toggle sound and speech settings to customize your experience.
unable_to_check_updates: Unable to check for updates. Please try again later.
waiting_for_host: Waiting for the host to start the game
waiting_for_host_name: Waiting for {hostName} to start the game
waiting_for_host_to_start: Waiting for Host to Start the Game
welcome_description: A classic childhood game of quick reflexes and flying objects!
you_are_using_latest_version: You are using the latest version of Chidiya Udd.
do_you_want_to_go_back: Do you want to go back?
deep_link_sharing_description: Share room codes with friends through deep links! Simply share the generated link and friends can join your room directly without manually entering the code.
auto_updates_description: Stay up to date with the latest features and bug fixes. The app automatically checks for updates and notifies you when new versions are available.
share_score_message:
